Articles.Content:
Hello﻿ Kerbonauts,

I'm rather new in this forum, but I've been playing KSP since it came out. 

Anyway, My game is heavily modded, and theres a mod that keeps giving me﻿ trouble. As the title says, its BDAc. I dont currently have it installed, but its given me trouble in the past. The first time I installed it, it Kraken'd my save file and corrupted my entire game.﻿

The second and third time i downloaded it ( third time from spacedock, first and second from curseforge), it worked ﻿but i couldnt right-click anything except the ﻿Rotary Launchers and Adjustable Missile ﻿Rails. 

 ﻿﻿﻿

Anyone able to help﻿?

Thanks A Million.﻿﻿

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

Moving to Add-on Discussions, hopefully you'll get some answers.

Though it's worth noting that if you're having issues with a particular mod, the best place to ask is usually in the mod's own release thread, since that's where the expert users (and author!) generally hang out.

1 hour ago, RelicSpaceAgency said:

Anyway, My game is heavily modded, and theres a mod that keeps giving me﻿ trouble. As the title says, its BDAc. I dont currently have it installed, but its given me trouble in the past. The first time I installed it, it Kraken'd my save file and corrupted my entire game.﻿

The second and third time i downloaded it ( third time from spacedock, first and second from curseforge), it worked ﻿but i couldnt right-click anything except the ﻿Rotary Launchers and Adjustable Missile ﻿Rails. 

The best place to start looking for trouble is the KSP.log.  Read this, publish the logs and then let's see what we find. Most problems are hard and cumbersome to diagnose, but simple to fix - let's see how lucky you are.
